arts.ttl: ‘What are we doing in midfield?‘ — Barcelona star seen visibly upset after conceding goals against Celta Vigo
arts.sum: FC Barcelona played out a 4-2 win against Celta Vigo at Balaidos. The Catalan club produced a Jekyll-and-Hyde two halves against their high-flying Galician opponents. The first 45 minutes were very end-to-end, with Barcelona’s back line falling apart like a pack of cards. arts.ttl: Flick talks Lewandowski, De Jong, Pedri, tactics after Celta Vigo 2-4 Barcelona
arts.sum: Barcelona cut down the gap to league leaders Real Madrid on Sunday night with a crucial 4-2 win over Celta Vigo away at Balaidos.
